content: I'd like to add FHIR#28407 to the agenda for our next call.
I'd like to take up the package related questions at the next FHIR-I call too:

• J#28342
  • J#28344
FYI: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179177-conformance/topic/Must-Support.20and.20element.20values

For our next call I have a few wrap-up issues on the SMART spec:

  • https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-33662
  • https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-34081
  • https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-33249

Can I request an agenda item for 10/18 to discuss whether change to: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/identifier-type should be done in FHIR core or part of a UTG request? We would like to add some additional values (as noted in https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-31750) . @Rob Hausam

Identifier is actually owned by MnM, so OO approving the request is actually out-of-order. I've re-opened on that basis.

UDI is an identifier "system" - i.e. it is already a unique kind of identifier. Identifier.type is used to establish generic classes of identifiers that could come from multiple systems. We specifically (and intentionally) excluded all of the v2 codes that referred to identifier systems.

@Lloyd McKenzie thanks for responding and reopening -- not sure how to address our requirement , but are you also suggesting that this is not a FHIR-I conversation? Do we need to bring attend MnM to discuss? As the types we are suggesting many not fit the UDI as they are not unique identifiers, but type/kind identifiers. Please advise where the discussion belongs. Thx. Marti
@Marti Velezis Yes, it'll be an MnM discussion.
Hello all, for today's call (October 18), would it be possible to add FHIR-34132 to the agenda? Thanks!
@FHIR-I Co-chairs For next week (10/25) we'll plan to bring publication requests for SMART App Launch and for Bulk Data.
We collectively noticed the ballot recon spreadsheets are not posted for Bulk or SMART App Launch...Do any of the @FHIR-I Co-chairs mind if we post? (we = @Josh Mandel or me).
Both already 'passed', but I know we must post before publication.
image.png
(number way left is 'Affirmatives', number way right is minimum number to pass)
No concerns
Also for agenda today: FHIR-34170 incorporating feedback from @Bas van den Heuvel QA (thanks Bas!!)
I'm waiting in the lobby for todays meeting. Is the meeting still on?
@FHIR-I Co-chairs
Happy Monday! Was wondering if we could add FHIR-34211 to the agenda for today please. Thanks!
sure!
Maybe we could take a look at these as well FHIR-33256 and FHIR-33232
FHIR#34306 is a candidate R4B change
(so would be nice to tackle on Monday)
Thanks -- added a note on the issue (want to understand why it's relevant/urgent for R4B).
